calculator.title: Simple Calculator
calculator.description: A basic calculator that performs arithmetic operations: addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.
calculator.output:
Enter an operator (+, -, *, /): +
Enter two operands: 10 5

student.title: Student Management System
student.description: Manage student records with add, delete, and search functionality.

5. Exit

Enter student ID: 101
Enter student name: John
Enter student marks: 85.5
